components.description:
A bow and arrow used in the sport of archery. May also be used by cupid.

Can also be used to represent ‚ôê Sagittarius in the Western zodiac.
components.title: Bow and Arrow

description:
A bow and arrow used in the sport of archery. May also be used by cupid.

Can also be used to represent ‚ôê Sagittarius in the Western zodiac.
title: Bow and Arrow

version.description: The Unicode Consortium has approved the following 41 emoji characters as part of Unicode 8.0, released on June 17, 2015. This is comprised of 37 new emojis, plus five emoji modifiers. Find out more about this update on the Emojipedia Blog.

emoji_net_data.category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Sport symbols
emoji_net_data.definition: A bow and arrow used in the sport of archery. May also be used by cupid. Bow and Arrow was approved as part of Unicode 8.0 in 2015 and added http://emojipedia.org/bow-and-arrow/
emoji_net_data.name: bow and arrow

bn:00005415n: The practice or sport of shooting arrows with a bow.
The sport of shooting arrows with a bow
The art or sport of shooting with a bow.
Archery is the art, practice, or skill of propelling arrows with the use of a bow, from Latin arcus.

bn:00012475n: A weapon consisting of arrows and the bow to shoot them
A weapon consisting of a bow and a supply of arrows, often kept in a quiver.
A weapon system that uses elasticity to propel arrows, its use is archery
The bow and arrow is a projectile weapon system that predates recorded history and is common to most cultures.

bn:00005411n: The person, in a team or among oarsmen, positioned nearest the bow.
One who shoots an arrow from a bow or a bolt from a crossbow.
A person who is expert in the use of a bow and arrow
Someone who shoots an arrow from a bow or a bolt from a crossbow.

bn:16684083n: Someone with a Sagittarius star sign.
Someone with a Sagittarius star sign
Sagittarius is the ninth astrological sign, which is associated with the constellation Sagittarius.
A Zodiac sign corresponding to the constellation

bn:00005704n: An instrument of attack or defense in combat, as a gun, missile, or sword.
Any instrument or instrumentality used in fighting or hunting
An instrument of attack or defense in combat or hunting, e.g. most guns, missiles, or swords.
Instrument used to inflict damage or harm to living beings, structures, or systems
A weapon, arm, or armament is any device used in order to inflict damage or harm to living beings, structures, or systems.
Weapon, arm, or armament are terms for any device used to inflict damage or harm to living beings, structures, or systems.

bn:00068829n: A large zodiacal constellation in the southern hemisphere; between Scorpius and Capricornus
One of the twelve constellations of the zodiac.
Sagittarius is one of the constellations of the zodiac.

apple_vendor_description: Apple‚Äôs bow and arrow emoji is meticulously crafted with a sleek, polished aesthetic, showcasing glossy 3D shading that highlights the taut string and the gracefully curved bow. Realistic lighting brings out the texture of the wood and the sharp point of the arrow, with soft, rounded edges that maintain Apple‚Äôs signature approachable design. This emoji powerfully symbolizes aim, focus, aspiration, or taking a shot, representing a clear objective with the precision and elegance characteristic of Apple's visual language.
